title: OCE Cannot connect to game after champ select

embed.description: Grab seriously instant screenshots, screen GIFs, and webpage captures. Get the free app for Windows or Mac to streamline your visual sharing and bookmarking today.

body:
Other people having problems in OCE connecting to game after champ select, permanently losing games as cannot connect, lost 3 games by this and now have a 5 game low priority que, seems fair anyone help.


[](https://gyazo.com/ecf24b5254646aef9707b9e4f9f8b762)

replies.body:
Hi

Sucks to hear you've been having these issues.

Are you with Optus?  There is an issue that appears to be affecting some players who use them as their ISP.

If so, send in a support ticket about the leaverbuster penalty and the support team will be able to have a look.

Cheers
Mindstar

Send a support ticket that will take about 24 hours to be reviewed? By the time this happens his leaver buster will be done with.

Get your own OCE support ffs
